validations.description: User ID must not be empty
validations.condition: USERIDI OF COSGN0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error message 'Please enter User ID' and return to sign-on screen

validations.description: Password must not be empty
validations.condition: PASSWDI OF COSGN0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error message 'Please enter a Password' and return to sign-on screen

validations.description: User credentials must match records in USRSEC file
validations.condition: SEC-USR-ID NOT = USERIDI OR SEC-USR-PWD NOT = PASSWDI
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid User ID and/or Password' and return to sign-on screen

validations.description: User record must exist in security file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid User ID and/or Password'

validations.description: User ID must not be empty for list operation
validations.condition: USERIDI OF COUSR0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Please enter User ID' and set error flag

validations.description: Password must not be empty for authentication
validations.condition: PASSWDI OF COUSR0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Please enter a Password' and set error flag

validations.description: Selection action must be valid (S or U)
validations.condition: User selection not 'S' or 'U'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid selection. Valid value is S or U'

validations.description: First name must not be empty
validations.condition: FNAMEI OF COUSR1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'First Name can NOT be empty...' and set cursor to field

validations.description: Last name must not be empty
validations.condition: LNAMEI OF COUSR1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Last Name can NOT be empty...' and set cursor to field

validations.description: User ID must not be empty
validations.condition: USERIDI OF COUSR1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User ID can NOT be empty...' and set cursor to field

validations.description: Password must not be empty
validations.condition: PASSWDI OF COUSR1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Password can NOT be empty...' and set cursor to field

validations.description: User type must not be empty
validations.condition: USRTYPEI OF COUSR1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User Type can NOT be empty...' and set cursor to field

validations.description: User ID must be unique
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(DUPKEY) OR DFHRESP(DUPREC)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User ID already exist...'

validations.description: User ID must not be empty for user update
validations.condition: USRIDINI OF COUSR2AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User ID can NOT be empty...' and return to screen

validations.description: First name must not be empty during update
validations.condition: FNAMEI OF COUSR2AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'First Name can NOT be empty...'

validations.description: Last name must not be empty during update
validations.condition: LNAMEI OF COUSR2AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Last Name can NOT be empty...'

validations.description: Password must not be empty during update
validations.condition: PASSWDI OF COUSR2AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Password can NOT be empty...'

validations.description: User type must not be empty during update
validations.condition: USRTYPEI OF COUSR2AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User Type can NOT be empty...'

validations.description: User record must exist for update operation
validations.condition: User not found in USRSEC file (WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND))
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'User ID not found'

validations.description: User data must be modified before update
validations.condition: USR-MODIFIED-NO is true (no changes detected)
validations.failureOutcome: Display message 'Please modify to update ...'

validations.description: Transaction ID must be numeric
validations.condition: TRNIDINI OF COTRN0AI IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Tran ID must be Numeric ...' and set error flag

validations.description: Selection action must be 'S' (view) or 's'
validations.condition: CDEMO-CT00-TRN-SEL-FLG not 'S' or 's'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid selection. Valid value is S'

validations.description: Transaction ID must not be empty for detail view
validations.condition: TRNIDINI OF COTRN1AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Tran ID can NOT be empty...' and return to screen

validations.description: Transaction must exist in TRANSACT file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Transaction ID NOT found...'

validations.description: Account ID filter must be numeric
validations.condition: CC-ACCT-ID IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'ACCOUNT FILTER,IF SUPPLIED MUST BE A 11 DIGIT NUMBER' and set input error flag

validations.description: Account ID must not be empty or zero
validations.condition: CC-ACCT-ID EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Set input error flag and display 'Account number not provided'

validations.description: Account status must be Y or N
validations.condition: FLG-YES-NO-CHECK not 'Y' or 'N'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Account Active Status must be Y or N'

validations.description: Credit limit must be supplied and not blank
validations.condition: ACUP-NEW-CREDIT-LIMIT EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Credit Limit must be supplied'

validations.description: Credit limit must be numeric
validations.condition: ACUP-NEW-CREDIT-LIMIT IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Credit Limit is not valid'

validations.description: Customer first name must contain only alphabetic characters and spaces
validations.condition: Name contains non-alphabetic characters after INSPECT conversion
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'First Name can only contain alphabets and spaces'

validations.description: Customer last name must contain only alphabetic characters and spaces
validations.condition: Name contains non-alphabetic characters after INSPECT conversion
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Last Name can only contain alphabets and spaces'

validations.description: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits
validations.condition: Phone number length not equal to 10 after removing non-numeric characters
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Phone number must be 10 digits'

validations.description: Phone number area code must be valid North American area code
validations.condition: Area code not found in AREA-CODE-TABLE
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Area code is not valid'

validations.description: SSN must be exactly 9 digits
validations.condition: SSN length not equal to 9 or contains non-numeric characters
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'SSN must be a 9 digit number'

validations.description: SSN must not be all zeros
validations.condition: ACUP-NEW-CUST-SSN = ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'SSN must be a 9 digit number'

validations.description: FICO score must be numeric
validations.condition: ACUP-NEW-CUST-FICO-SCORE-X IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'FICO score must be numeric'

validations.description: Account must exist in account master file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Did not find this account in account master file'

validations.description: Customer must exist in customer master file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Did not find associated customer in master file'

validations.description: Account ID filter must be numeric 11 digit number
validations.condition: CC-ACCT-ID IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'ACCOUNT FILTER,IF SUPPLIED MUST BE A 11 DIGIT NUMBER' and set input error flag

validations.description: Account ID must not be empty or zero
validations.condition: CC-ACCT-ID EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Account number not provided' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card number filter must be numeric 16 digit number
validations.condition: CC-CARD-NUM IS NOT NUMERIC
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'CARD ID FILTER,IF SUPPLIED MUST BE A 16 DIGIT NUMBER' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card number must not be empty or zero
validations.condition: CC-CARD-NUM EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Card number not provided' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card name must not be empty
validations.condition: CCUP-NEW-CRDNAME EQUAL LOW-VALUES OR SPACES OR ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Card name not provided' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card name must contain only alphabetic characters and spaces
validations.condition: Card name contains non-alphabetic characters after INSPECT conversion
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Card name can only contain alphabets and spaces' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card active status must be Y or N
validations.condition: CCUP-NEW-CRDSTCD not 'Y' or 'N'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Card Active Status must be Y or N' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card expiry month must be between 1 and 12
validations.condition: CARD-MONTH-CHECK-N not in range 1 THRU 12
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Card expiry month must be between 1 and 12' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card expiry year must be in valid range (1950-2099)
validations.condition: CARD-YEAR-CHECK-N not in range 1950 THRU 2099
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid card expiry year' and set input error flag

validations.description: Card record must exist for the account/card combination
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Did not find cards for this search condition'

validations.description: Changes must be detected before update
validations.condition: CCUP-NEW-CARDDATA EQUAL CCUP-OLD-CARDDATA
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'No change detected with respect to values fetched'

validations.description: Transaction amount must not exceed available credit limit
validations.condition: WS-TRANSACTION-AMT > WS-AVAILABLE-AMT
validations.failureOutcome: Authorization declined with response code '05' and reason '4100' (insufficient funds), approved amount set to 0

validations.description: Card must exist in card cross-reference file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND) after reading CCXREF file
validations.failureOutcome: Set CARD-NFOUND-XREF flag, log error 'CARD NOT FOUND IN XREF', decline authorization with reason '3100'

validations.description: Account must exist in account master file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND) after reading account file
validations.failureOutcome: Set NFOUND-ACCT-IN-MSTR flag, log error 'ACCT NOT FOUND IN XREF', decline authorization with reason '3100'

validations.description: Customer must exist in customer master file
validations.condition: WS-RESP-CD = DFHRESP(NOTFND) after reading customer file
validations.failureOutcome: Set NFOUND-CUST-IN-MSTR flag, log error 'CUST NOT FOUND IN XREF', decline authorization with reason '3100'

validations.description: MQ request message must be retrieved successfully
validations.condition: WS-COMPCODE NOT = MQCC-OK AND WS-REASON NOT = MQRC-NO-MSG-AVAILABLE
validations.failureOutcome: Set error flag, log error 'FAILED TO READ REQUEST MQ'

validations.description: User ID must not be empty
validations.condition: USERIDI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Set INPUT-ERROR flag and display error message

validations.description: Password must not be empty
validations.condition: PASSWDI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
validations.failureOutcome: Set INPUT-ERROR flag and display error message

validations.description: Account filter must be valid when provided
validations.condition: Account filter validation flag FLG-ACCTFILTER-NOT-OK
validations.failureOutcome: Set input error and display appropriate error message

validations.description: Card filter must be valid when provided
validations.condition: Card filter validation flag FLG-CARDFILTER-NOT-OK
validations.failureOutcome: Set input error and display appropriate error message

validations.description: Only one record can be selected for view or update
validations.condition: WS-EDIT-SELECT-COUNTER > 1
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'PLEASE SELECT ONLY ONE RECORD TO VIEW OR UPDATE'

validations.description: Selection action must be S (view) or U (update)
validations.condition: WS-EDIT-SELECT not 'S' or 'U'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'INVALID ACTION CODE'

validations.description: Account file must open successfully
validations.condition: ACCTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Account file read must be successful
validations.condition: ACCTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00' AND NOT = '10'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Output file write must be successful
validations.condition: OUTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00' AND NOT = '10'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ACCOUNT FILE WRITE STATUS IS', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Customer file must open successfully
validations.condition: CUSTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ERROR OPENING CUSTFILE', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Customer file read must be successful
validations.condition: CUSTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00' AND NOT = '10'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ERROR READING CUSTOMER FILE', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Customer file close must be successful
validations.condition: CUSTFILE-STATUS NOT = '00'
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'ERROR CLOSING CUSTOMER FILE', perform IO status display, and abend program

validations.description: Queue manager connection must be retrieved successfully
validations.condition: WS-CICS-RESP1-CD NOT = DFHRESP(NORMAL)
validations.failureOutcome: Set error location 'CICS RETREIVE', build error message with response codes, perform error handling, and terminate

validations.description: MQ request message must be retrieved successfully
validations.condition: WS-COMPCODE NOT = MQCC-OK AND WS-REASON NOT = MQRC-NO-MSG-AVAILABLE
validations.failureOutcome: Set error flag, log error with code 'M003', message 'FAILED TO READ REQUEST MQ'

validations.description: Account ID must be provided for account view
validations.condition: Account ID is spaces, low-values, or zeros
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'Account number not provided' and return to search screen

validations.description: Account ID must be numeric
validations.condition: Account ID is not numeric
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'Account number must be a non zero 11 digit number'

validations.description: Account ID or Card number must be provided for card search
validations.condition: Both account ID and card number are empty
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'No input received' error

validations.description: Card number must be numeric if provided
validations.condition: Card number is not numeric
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'Card number if supplied must be a 16 digit number'

validations.description: Menu option must be numeric and within valid range
validations.condition: WS-OPTION IS NOT NUMERIC OR WS-OPTION > CDEMO-ADMIN-OPT-COUNT OR WS-OPTION = ZEROS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Please enter a valid option number...'

validations.description: Only one action can be selected at a time
validations.condition: WS-MORETHAN1ACTION is true (more than 1 action selected)
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Please select only 1 action'

validations.description: Action code must be valid (D for delete or U for update)
validations.condition: WS-EDIT-SELECT not 'D' or 'U'
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Action code selected is invalid'

validations.description: Changes must be detected before update
validations.condition: NO-CHANGES-FOUND is true
validations.failureOutcome: Display 'No change detected with respect to database values.'

validations.description: Transaction file must open successfully for batch processing
validations.condition: File status not successful on open
validations.failureOutcome: Display error and abend program

validations.description: Menu selection must be valid option
validations.condition: Menu selection not in valid range
validations.failureOutcome: Display error 'Invalid menu selection'
